revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Orange Pi |model=5 |revision=Plus (8GB) |asin=B0C5C29F87 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=currently shipping |price=109 |est_release_date=5/2023 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3588 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8-2.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=8 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=XMC |fla1_model=25QU128CWIQ |ram1=8 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4UBE3D-4AAMGCR |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (M.2), USB 3.1 (Gen 1), USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8125BG |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8125BG |lan_speed=2.5GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=2.5GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Low Power I2C RTC;AnalogTek;AT8563S;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio CODEC;Everest Semiconductor;ES8388;;1;,,, 2W Class-K Audio Amplifier;Awinic Technology;AW8733A;;1;,,, 4 Differential + 1 LVCMOS Output High Performance Buffer;Aurasemi;AU5426;;1;,,, PMIC;Rockchip;RK806-1;;1; |flags=HDMI 2.1, Micro SD Card slot, Audio in/out (3.5mm), MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, TP, Microphone, IR receiver, I2C, SPI, CAN, PWM, UART, GPIO, RTC w/ battery, fan header }} {{TagLine|Open-source Single-board Computer}} :[http://www.orangepi.org/html/hardWare/computerAndMicrocontrollers/details/Orange-Pi-5-plus.html Product page]
OrangePi logo and "OPi5 PLUS V1.1" are on top of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[http://www.orangepi.org/orangepiwiki/index.php/Orange_Pi_5_Plus ''Orange Pi 5 Plus'' on '''OrangePi''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/99-00-orange-pi-5-plus-sbc-is-now-available-to-order/ ''Orange Pi 5 Plus SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/05/10/orange-pi-5-plus-sbc-switches-to-rockchip-rk3588-soc-brings-dual-hdmi-2-1-dual-2-5gbe-m-2-pcie-sockets/ ''Orange Pi 5 Plus SBC switches to Rockchip RK3588 SoC'' on '''CNX-Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3588 @2.4GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A76) :+ @1.8GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G610 MP4 (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.2); NPU Support 6T, :VPU (with 8K@60fps VP9 and 8K@30fps H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (QSPI NOR) Flash, TF card (max. 64GB) / : MMC card slot / eMMC Flash socket *Memory: 8GB (SDRAM) LPDDR4X *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Type-C), 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCIe: 1x M.2 Key M (PCIe 3.0 x4), 1x M.2 Key E :(PCIe 2.0 x1 / PCM/UART / USB2.0) sockets *Network: 2x 2.5GbE ports *Power: 5V/4A via USB (Type-C)
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Orange Pi models}}
